name: Nishikant Prasad
college: GURU TEGH BAHADUR INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (GGSIPU)

education.school: GURU TEGH BAHADUR INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (GGSIPU)

projects.name: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: Developed a C++ application to solve 9x9 Sudoku puzzles using a backtracking algorithm. The program includes functionalities for puzzle input, validation, solving, and solution display. Implemented a user-friendly console interface for puzzle entry and solution display. Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills, algorithmic expertise, and proficiency in C++, making me a valuable asset for software development roles.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: Developed a C++ application that visually demonstrates various sorting algorithms. The visualizer provides an educational tool to help users understand the inner workings of sorting algorithms through real-time graphical representation.

projects.name: Movie Recommender System Project
projects.description: Developed a machine learning-based movie recommender system aimed at providing personalized movie recommendations to users based on their preferences and behavior. The project leveraged collaborative filtering and content-based filtering techniques to enhance recommendation accuracy.

full_output.name: Nishikant Prasad
achievements_and_awards: Achieved a top 40 rank on the GeeksforGeeks platform during college, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in programming concepts.
Successfully completed the LeetCode 100 Days Challenge in 2023, showcasing dedication and advanced problem-solving skills in algorithms and data structures.
